entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 04:26 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
